short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically extract emails and social media profiles from any website while you browse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually searching for contact emails and social media profiles while browsing? In this tutorial, I'll show you how to use Mailsie, a powerful Chrome extension that automatically extracts emails and social media links (Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.) from any website you visit.

Learn how to effortlessly gather contact information in seconds and export everything into a CSV file with just one click. Perfect for sales, lead generation, and research!

ðŸ’¼ Best for: Marketers, sales professionals, researchers, and anyone who needs quick access to contact info.
